text: Robert Lee Davis (January 15, 1930 – October 2, 2011) was an American football and wrestling coach. He served as the head football coach at Carson–Newman University in Jefferson City, Tennessee from 1964 to 1965 and the head wrestling coach at the University of Tennessee in Knoxville, Tennessee from 1970 to 1974. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths Category:People from Bluefield, West Virginia Category:Players of American football from West Virginia Category:American football centers Category:Tennessee Volunteers football players Category:Coaches of American football from West Virginia Category:High school football coaches in Tennessee Category:Carson–Newman Eagles football coaches Category:Tennessee Volunteers football coaches Category:College wrestling coaches in the United States
title: Bob Davis (American football, born 1930)
